turns.text: Uh Kate what kind of uh where do you like to eat out
turns.label: qw

turns.text: Well we uh we really like the Mexican food you know here in Texas --
turns.label: sd

turns.text: -- and uh so we try and go around to different Mexican restaurants trying them out and so uh Tias is probably our favorite uh restaurant there and I think they have one of the best services that uh that we really like it

turns.label: bh

turns.label: sd

turns.text: Oh that uh no we havent explored uh you know too many places Um you know lot of the big name brand I guess uh chains --
-- yeah but um oh weve tried places you know down uh by the Collin Creek Mall the uh you know Alvarez and um gosh we tried what was across the street El Pasos --
turns.label: b

turns.text: Oh El Chicos or El Fenix --
-- El Chicos or something yeah something --
uh-huh uh-huh Well I like Tias better than I do El Chicos or El Fenix
turns.label: b

turns.text: Uh much better Uh Mother Mesquites is one of our favorites but then fajitas are one of my uh - I like it better than just about anything --

turns.label: sv

turns.text: -- in their own uh homemade flour tortillas that are just absolutely wonderful
Especially with butter and honey on them
turns.label: sv

turns.text: uh-huh uh-huh Oh I know I tell I tell you what They are they just um theyre excellent uh excellent food I wish I could make them here at home
turns.label: b

turns.label: ny

turns.text: -- good seafood but uh the service has always been so strange every time Ive been in there Mostly its been at lunch time --
-- and uh but I hear at night though they have uh you know the outdoor um bar and um uh thats its really uh you know kind of lively

turns.text: So its its really good All their blackened grill stuff

turns.text: -- or uh I believe its Rusty Scupper over on uh uh Dallas Parkway --
-- in Addison which is absolutely wonderful
The service is great They have every kind of fish that you could imagine youd want --
turns.label: sd

turns.text: -- and the the atmosphere is wonderful too If you want really special night out and fish food --
turns.label: sd

turns.text: Oh well I uh I have children and and work and so we uh we can eat lot of fast food
turns.label: sd

I cant look McDonalds in the face now

Yeah I know They they theyre just spoiled rotten but uh but no I uh uh we love to eat out of course its just so much easier and simpler --

turns.label: b
